# title

**Instance Property**

The text that the template displays as the item’s title.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String? { get }
```

## Accessing the Item’s Attributes

- **detail**: The text that the template displays below or beside the item’s title.

items.description: The text that the template displays below or beside the item’s title.
items.name: detail

title: title
